img_prompt: Identify this image. Is there a machine present? And are there any issues that are visibly apparent. For answering these questions, provide the output as exactly a JSON format: {'is_machine':'boolean','machine_type':'string', 'make': 'string', 'model': 'string' , 'issue': 'string' } (feel free to add other values in the json that make sense). If any of the string values are unable to be observed, set its value to None.

additional_questions.Visible lines or dark patches on the ima: Dead elements in the array, defective cables or connectors,or bent/broken pins.
additional_questions.Weak or patchy imaging due to misplaced: Dropping the probe, which misplaces the crystals.
additional_questions.Cracks or splits in the flexible rubber: Continuous strain and tension on the cables.
additional_questions.Impaired scanning ability due to bent p: Excessive use leading to bent or broken pins
additional_questions.Cracks, splits, or small tears in the so: Frequent contact with skin causing degradation over time.
additional_questions.Hairline scratches on the lens affecting: Cleaning and heavy usage over time
